content.detailedDescription:
At about 4:50am on april 16th, i couldn't sleep because i was extremely hungry so i went downstairs to the kitchen to get some cereal.  after fixing a bowl of cereal i was leaving the kitchen when i spotted an unusual glowing object in the sky out of the front door windows.  

im awake in the a.M. hours every day so it takes something pretty unusual to catch my eye.  the object i saw was just visible above the tree line at the end of the street.  distance wise it appeared to be above the next neighborhood over but i can't be for certain.

at first i thought to myself that it must the moon, but it was such a bold yellow color and i had never seen the moon look that way before.  it was a half-circle boomerang shape with the bow of it facing toward the ground which also seemed unusual to me.  as far as i could tell it appeared to simply be hovering over one spot.  at 4:50am we still have roughly 2 hours until daylight aswell so this left me more confused.  the object also had an aura-like glow to it like the sun during the sunset hours but this was long before even sunrise.

my first reaction when i noticed this object was one of skepticism.  that initial reaction quickly turned into disbelief as i went back upstairs to get another look at it from higher up.  i've always been a believer in ufos, but i had never seen one myself prior to this so i tried to remain skeptical.

after my second look at the object i sat down at my computer desk to file a ufo report.  i first checked to see if i could find any reports of other people seeing strange things in other parts of the state recently. after about 2 minutes i looked for the object again and it was slightly lowered so that i could barely make it out through the tree tops.  after that i came to the mufon website to file my report.  when i looked outside again after about another 45 seconds, the object was gone.  im not sure if it landed somewhere or left the area but the last time i saw the object it was lowering more toward the horizon.

my first thought of it possibly being the moon was dispelled after it dissapeared so quickly.  the moon takes a lot longer than 10 minutes to move that distance and as i said at this time of morning there is almost 2 hours until daylight left.

it should probably be noted that fort knox is only 11 miles from my home.  they do fly aircraft in and out of there, but they seldomly pass over this area and when they do its easy to hear.  the object i saw made no sound and it was a very solid shape and color, not a flashing light.

i have attached an extremely crude illustration of what i saw.  i am not an artist.
content.summary: Large bright and bold yellow half-circle in the sky that hovered in one spot before moving on.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside an a big ball of green light flying real fast an then just all of a sudden it just went i told my friends if yall would of seen just seen i sware that mom wouldnt wake up on my knees i sware i just a big ball of green light i feel like stupid telling people about always seeing mysterious lights in my life down this same road i have reported to yall before. what i saw tonight i have never seen something so out of the ordinary in my life someone really needs to do some investigation in this area its making scared an i know im not crazy after i seen the ball   of green light one of my friends came a different side of town i just asked him if he saw something in the air he said i thought i was crazy looking at a ball of green light flying in the sky, an it was glowing flying kinda fast but i saw it go down man this is like seeing the most scaryest thing i ever seen in my life.This is an ongoing sightings an no one seems to think this is really occuring here but it really needs to be checked out you probably find a little infomation this is really not a joke
content.summary: A big ball of green light

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on u.S 31 headed toward kokomo from indianapolis.  i was just about to the tipton/howard county line when i saw a very large, bright orange sparkling ball of light in the western sky.  (to my left out the car window) as i watch this bright light, another one and then another one popped in on either side of it.  the new 2 were not as bright and were a little higher in the sky than the very large one.  they kinda formed a triangle pattern in the sky.  they were approximately 45 degrees up from the horizon.  the larger one was about 35-40 degrees up.   the larger one was about the size of 1/2 a baby asprin at arms length.  the other two were about half the size of the bigger one.  just as soon as the 3rd one appeared and the three of them made the triangular pattern and kinda looked like they were just bobbing a bit, in sync with each other and floating there, looking all orange and sparkly bright, they popped off one at a time.  first the two smaller ones popped out one at a time and then the bigger one just kinda faded into the dark..  the whole thing lasted less than a minute.  funny thing was i was scanning the sky as i traveled down the road and i was just thinking it would be a perfect night to see the orange balls of light.  and within seconds of having that thought, there they were!  blew me away! i raced home to get my camcorder and went back out to see if i could see them again.  i noticed that when i got home all the dogs in the neighborhood were howling and making strange noises.  and barking like maniacs.  (it is now nearly midnight and they are still out there barking their lungs out) i did not see anything when i went back out.  (i think from now on i won't go anywhere without my camera!)  this is the third time i have seen these lights in just a few weeks time.  the weather was nice.  sky was clear, lots of stars, temp was 45 degrees.  no wind and no moisture. i felt excited.  and a little creeped out.
content.summary: 3 orange balls of light

content.detailedDescription: My son, robby, was leaving to go pick up a friend.  he stepped out onto our porch and immediately spotted an orange light or fireball with several flashing lights all around it.  there were maybe 20-30 bright little flashing lights that were under neath the object which was triangular in shape.  it moved off towards the west.  then there were 4 bright orange fireballs that got brighter then went out but the small flashing lights stayed throughout the eastern sky.  another rectangular long object with a light on each side came from the western sky but got too low behind a tree line so we could no longer see it.  we tried to capture some of this on video but the video did not turn out well as our camera (a small cheap one) was unable to focus.  several planes came around the time the objects and the flashing lights left.  this is the third major incident we have had in our home here.  i will report this to rodger sugden of mufon tomorrow morning.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange fireballs and light flashes in western sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 9 yrs old in stephenville, tx. and taking the trash out through the backyard.  i walked about halfway to the fence when a circle of bluish light shone all around me from directly above.  i would say the circle was about 8-10 feet in dia. on the ground.  i looked up and all i could see was the light.  it was bright but it didn't hurt my eyes.  it lasted about 15- 20 seconds, not long, i didn't think anything about it.    this was back in the summer of '68 or '69.  i didn't tell anyone about it because they would think i was looney.

anyway, that winter, at the spot where the light shone down, the grass stayed green and needed mowing.  i remember my dad getting upset because my mom made him mow that spot just about every week.  that winter was the only one that i remember the grass growing throughout the winter.  it was st. augustine grass. 

i wasn't scared or anything, because i didn't know any better.  i had my head down watching where i was walking so as not to step in dog mess.  then just suddenly, a bluish light circle lit me up.  i looked up and yep, it was a blue light.  it lasted about 15-20 seconds and then it just turned off.  no craft, no nothing, no stucture or anything where the light was.  i was looking at it when it turned off.  there was nothing there that i can remember.  i emptied the trash and went in the house.

it was just getting the dark part of dusk.  it was pretty dark outside but not quite night. i could see stars and i don't recall seeing the moon.

anyway,  i told my wife about this some years ago.  she says she believes me but, i think she was just saying that.  we saw the stephenville ufo show on the history channel the other day and she insisted that i tell y'all about it.  she also thinks now that because of the incident, i heal faster than just about anybody i know.  

i would like to thank you for your time.  i feel better knowing that there are some people who will listen to things like this with open minds.
content.summary: A circle of light shone on me and the grass didn't die that winter in the cricle

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing in the yard of our family farm in southern indiana. i saw two cigar shaped objects traveling toward me from an area known as marble hill; this is the site of a failed nuclear plant. 

the objects then turned south toward the ohio river. at this point the objects were close enough that i could see that they did not have cockpits, they were just long and smooth. the objects were very shiny like mirrors and they did not make any noise. they flew over my grandfathers field then as they flew over a wooded area they disappeared.

i was used to seeing military aircraft as well as civilian planes, as there was a small airport and a military testing area just a few miles from my home. (jefferson proving ground) 

i reported the incident to my family but they just wrote it off as a young boy���s imagination. 

mufon may contact me via email.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two cigar shaped shiny objects, on noise, no cockpits.

content.detailedDescription: On apr 1st, i was driving through kansas, heading west, on i-70. i drove over a small rise and came upon an area with tons (100's?) of birds of different types. most all were on the ground, except for a few that were headed down. i was looking at the birds when i noticed light reflecting off of something, like a mirror. i was leaning forward a great deal and looking out of my front window, so i must have been looking up at about 75-80 degrees. at first, i thought i was looking at a bunch of birds flying around each other, but then noticed how much higher they were than anything else. must have been a few thousand feet. judging by the height, these objects must have been pretty large because they were still clearly visable. i was able to relate the height by looking at the birds. there were maybe 27 of them swarming around each other in a fixed position; not making any progress across the sky. they appeared silver and light reflected off of them often. at one point, they stopped moving haphazardly and began to form 3 separate v formations (9 spheres in each), staggered slightly in position and height. they stayed like this for a few seconds (20 or so), at which point i tried to take a picture with my camera phone. at almost the same time, each of the formations (at slightly staggered times)grew brighter, as a group, and then just disappeared. gone from the sky completely. from my albeit limited knowledge of biology, birds don't do that. when i attempted to view my camera phone picture, it wasn't there. in addition, the face of my phone was fried. it has a permanent wierdly shaped image on it.
content.summary: Multiple spherical silver objects

content.detailedDescription: There were many nights, when i was a child.  i couldn't sleep and would get up and look out my bedroom window, and see this event repeated exactly the same every time.  about the time i would panic or be thinking maybe it is a/some helicopters(???) they would zing into different directions and disappear.  i never saw but heard from local folks the animals we had in the hills would be found slaughtered on and off throughout this period of time.  i'm re-submitting this because i did not proofread this subject matter and it was poorly presented.  i am sure i discussed this with my sister or brother, but would have to get back with you whether they ever saw anything or not.  the color of the lights were a lime(?) green, they were slender oblong or cigar-like shapes.  by the way my age is 45 and i have been a rn for 22 years.
content.summary: At the top of one particular mountain in a diamond or triangular shape, they would hover and disperse in different directions within seconds

content.detailedDescription:
For some reason, phoenix seems to be a hotspot for these star-like craft that have been appearing almost daily. i have been making a point of looking at the sky whenever i am outside and scanning to see if i can get a chance to someday see one of these craft at a lower altitude than what i normally do. these craft appear out of nowhere and sit stationary for a few seconds, and then they will take off at a leisurely pace across the sky until they are out of my line of sight. today i saw a total of 3 of these craft in the space of 10 minutes, and they all appeared about 2 minutes apart from each other and all of them headed to the east towards the superstition mountain range east of phoenix. i didn't see any yesterday (monday) but i have no doubt that i will probably see more of these ufo's as the week progresses. unfortunately i don't have a camera with a telephoto lens so i can photograph the evidence, but i intend to borrow one from a friend tonight so perhaps my next report will have 'proof' that i am seeing these craft. until then - keep your eyes on the skies if you are in phoenix and hopefully you too will get a chance to see these amazing craft in action ! 

peace - john birmingham
content.summary: I saw a total of 3 ufo's that just 'popped' into existence in the sky almost directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 13 years old and normally i slept with window open.I am guessing at the time and date when i had this happen. i woke up from sleep suddenly due to no noise as normally heard during the night. i think it was the fact i didn't hear the crickets anymore that woke me. i also notice no tree/leave sound in the breeze, no wind/ breeze. i pulled back the corner of the blind on my window and looked out over the pool in the backyard (southwest out my window to the backyard) and saw the object above the tree--large eucalyptus up the backyard bank up about 50 feet up ther hill. the object , a large polished ball, was just about 40-50 feet over and just southwest of the tree. i think it was approximately 100-120 feet in diameter and made no sound. i looked away and looked back again and it had not moved, i also noticed the reflection of the tree, the fence and a moon light. i wasn't uneasy, but i felt a little unsure as to if i was dreaming, or just seeing things. my father came to my room and looked out the window and said that he thought it was wierd that there wasn't any noise and told me to go back to sleep.He said he didn't see anything. i layed back down in my bed and in about 20 secs after i layed back down, i sat back up and looked out again, the thing that made me sit up and look again was the breeze was again blowing and the crickets were chirping. i never saw this object again and still wonder to this day why i saw this.
content.summary: Woke from sleep and saw perfectly round object that was polished and reflected trees and moon.

content.detailedDescription: Co-worker and i were out on back dock enjoying the cool temps. and sun, watching planes and the like,  when co-worker noticed what at first appeared to be a small white object travelling over our location ene to wsw at a decent clip. the skies were very clear blue with very broken clouds at about 5-8k. my first impression was it was a daytime iss sighting but then it just hovered or floated above our bldg at about 5-7k for about 8 mins. it appeared to be a bright white sphere with a cylindrical protuberance that acted like a weather vane in behavior but didn't seem to be affected by wind direction per se. saw an airliner fly above it at near cruising altitude but it wasnt near enough to it to give a good indication of relative height/size. after about 7-8 minutes over our location it began to drift away at a very slow pace then gradually, nearly exponentially quickly accelerated off out of sight to the wsw. i am half in, half out this being a released balloon possibly caught in an updraft over our position up until the point of its accelerating off like it did. now i'm not sure....We lost sight of it as it blended into the diffuse light of the far distance near our horizon. i called tys tower and they say they tracked nothing unusual in our area.
content.summary: Unfamiliar object come from ene to wsw, seemed to float above bldg. then left on original course.

content.detailedDescription:
First of all i'm 13 years old i not pranking you and i kinda wish i hadn't seen it because i almost afraid of something bad happening. okay here we go- i was at my friends house who lives right across the street. we were jumping on his trampoline and i looked up in the western sky towards our town of salem. the first thing i thought was a u.F.O because i had thought i had seen one earlier that day. the one i had seen earlier was like a blimp, no vapor trail or anything but back to the star like one. okay it came from across the sky and the first thing i noticed was that it had no vapor trail and it stayed at a steady pace. as it was going past us my friend and my sister felt quesy sick to our stomache. we watched slowly go towards the eastern sky. it slowed down at the treeline 
it slowed down and a red and green strobe light span aroud. afterwards we felt like we didn't want to discuss it but i forced myself to talk about it and forced them to. we went and told my dad a former marine areoplane
mecanic he had no idea what it was we described. my friend shawn is gay i'm doing htis to piss him off.
content.summary: A shiny metalic yellow like it was on fire it also sort of a strobe light flashing green and red

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway looking at the stars in highlands ranch, co facing south. i was making some observations for a class i am taking for school. i was taking a break and gazing while chatting with my dad. i looked to what i thought was a shooting star, pointing for my dad and i realized it wasn't. my second thought was "oh no this looks like an airplane breaking up on fire" and my heart started to sink. then they got a little closer and it was 3 boomerang unidentified flying objects flying in a delta formation. the boomerang was that of dark orange almost brown. what i thought was fire and a shooting star where the 'wingman' sort of floating and dancing around the lead, almost playing with each other. the center craft was maintaing its heading. i saw them in the southwest sky and tracked them to the east till i could no longer see them. there was for but a second i could hardly make out the centers disc outline. it was really odd, yet i was very excited. i have a pilots license and i know what aircraft are capable of and i can identify any commercial, millitary and civilian aircraft, but the speed and the manuvering where unreal. i you were to see all three flying it looked like a wobbling duck with the center craft being the head and its wings were the 2 flanking it. i would estimate that they where less than 3 away miles, and 5,000 to 15,000 feet high and travelling 600-1000+ miles per hour and were completly silent and lasted 20 seconds. this was my first unidentified citing and i was strangly okay with it. i know for certain i will have my head turned towards the heaven much more now.
content.summary: 3 boomerang flying in delta formation

content.detailedDescription:
Subjec states: observing visual objects, triangle in shape, every other night, various colors, appearing near home, and staying for  a length of time, and up to five objects at a time, approximately every other night. large cockpit, , actual size only seen thru binoculars<penny shaped>. elevation 40 to 60 degrees, altitude 150 feet, aproximately 150 yards from individual., observed direction sw or north, disappearing  below tree line.Prominent colors, red,blue, white  in the middle.Some of the objects have a red light in the center.W/ blue around the perimeter.

objects appear nightly unless it rains, they do not show, until a night or two later.Two objects  stay around the same spot for hours.

sometimes objects can be seen from out living room window.

subject observer states ...They are freaked out after sightings.
content.summary: Visual observation of objects triangle in shape appearing every few days

content.detailedDescription: I observed a deep amber light approaching my house. it was on the east side of 31 and parallel 26. as it approached 100 west, approximately, i observed another pulsating amber light directly underneath the one and it continued gliding north, parallel 31. the deep amber light glided toward my home and hovered. i could see beautiful blues and greens and amber with a red light pulsating and it appeared to be rotating.A friend and i went to the west side of my home where high activity has been observed. i counted 4, 2 stationary at different points, and 2 were gliding south to north at low height. it appeared they were at 200 west ( dixon road ) or further west around 350 west. as i was watching 1 of them, it stopped midair and hovered low above a house, it dropped about 4 inches visually and rose slowly and continued north.It appeared like about 1/2 to 3/4 mile away from my position. they had the same color lights as previous craft, after a few minutes, they would return, north to south on or around 200 west, and when they approached 26, they would turn on a dime and go back north. it was my impression they were looking for something and reminded me of a hawk, scanning the ground while soaring looking for food. i have been watching high activity for quite awhile. i know they are not planes, flares or anything normal.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Amber lights and craft

content.detailedDescription: in  september of 1981, i lived on  village rd. , villas n.J. two houses from the delaware bay. it was a beautiful sunny day around 5:00 pm. after work i would take my  louisville slugger to the bay to hit rocks out into water, watch the sunset, and blow off a long work day. i was watching where my rock would splash down when a ball of light, very bright white, like a welders arc flashed up and out from the water on a thirty degree angle, traveled at least a 1/2 mile or more, wavered for a split second like a wobble, shot back the direction it came from, then back up again on a 55 degree angle traveling two to three times the distance. two more shorter  bursts in  two different directions  then shot out of site at about a 75 degree angle heading ssw. i think this all took about two to three seconds, never seen anything move that fast.  my best guess is that it was  around five miles out or more in the delaware bay the distances where probably alot more then what they appeared to me.  the shape if anything was round and white hot. i stood there in disbelief. i looked down both sides of the beach looking to see if anyone else was there, just me.  i didn' know what to think. when i tried explaining what i had seen to my friends a joke was made. one of my smarter friends told me it was ball lightning.  i thought it was ball lightning  after all was said,  i had never seen ball lightning and it fit.  the need to tell anyone else of this event was put on the shelf 27 years ago. 2008- my children where flicking through the channels six months or so ago  and one of the ufo programs was on, some of the details sounded very familiar to that day 27 years ago. i started investigating ball lightning on the internet and realized that no way was this ball lightning. this realization has led me to this point, one of knowing that what i had witnessed was maybee a once in a life time and that i'm fortunate enough to see it over and over again.   thanks
content.summary: A ball of light, very bright white, like a welders arc flashed up and out from the water.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom and i were coming home from a baseball game, and once we get up the road, we see this object in the sky. we knew it wasn't a helecopter because it didn't have flashing lights. we stayed at the sight for about 5 minutes then went home. when we drove off, we looked in the rear view mirrior and it was still there. it had red lights on the side, blue light on the back and a big huge yellow light on the bottom. it was about as bright as a yellow high-lighter. we wern't sure of what it could be. when we first saw it, we thought it was a ufo because airplanes don't have yellow lights on the bottom. we got out of the car, and it was silence, so it wasn't a helecopter for sure. the object is still there, not making a sound. we felt like something was visting us from anther world. the time of this happend at 8:27 pm on april 12,2008. also in dallas,oregon.
 the "ufo" sighting was right by ellendale rd. then we decied to go home, and thats how we lost sight of it.
content.summary: April 12, 2008

content.detailedDescription: 3 stars all night,same locations all night,until about 330am until around 430am,would be active with lights and movements,and lit up ground above our farm and neighbors acreage.Would go out into the hottub every night for two weeks and seen this,my husband didn't believe me i was telling him what i was seeing and i finally got him to come out to the hottub one night for about 1o minutes and he seen the star move towards us @ high speed and shot straight up and disappeared above us and he ran into the house and told me he was never going back out again. the same morning about 1130-12noon i heard a helicopter outside,i got up went out on the deck and seen a big black chopper with two propellors one on each end with two big square doors both were open on both sides and i could see people inside looking out of the doors flying back and forth for about 40-45 minutes,and then flew off.(best if i could explain in voice or person,to much since then that has been happening on our place.)snapped a photo in brod daylight taken july 23rd 2007, of a unknown creature that game and parks could not tell me what it is or was. but i know its not a dog. and its green with a horn on its head stands about 2 1/2 feet tall,looks like gray transparent wings lifting up a wooden pallet.I cant exsplain in writing very well as it would be easier to speek about all of this.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 stars all night,same locations all night,until about 330am until around 430am,would be active with lights and movements,and lit up ground above our farm and neighbors acreage.

content.detailedDescription:
Often times, while i am reading, i will let the nasa channel run in the background, especially during sts missions.  when i take a break from reading, i will rerun the footage to see if there is anything interesting.  it is amazing the number of times i see "orbs" and multiple types of other objects. on march 19th i hit the jackpot! about 15 or 20 minutes into the 1pm-2pm window of recording, a set of lights begins to emerge from the sheer blackness of space.  as the object comes into view, it seems as if it was emerging from the shadow of the station. the lights are in an area that is clearly not any part of the space station. i couldn't believe my eyes!

this craft is only defined by the light from its interior.  the exterior is lost in the blackness of space.  it appears that it is a hatbox circle or oval on top of a "skirt" disc/oval which is either dimmly lite from within or from the light reflected from the windows above.

in the windows of the upper "hatbox" there is clearly a light inside behind moving pixels.  everyone who has seen these moving pixels believe them to be "beings". the light in these upper windows varies in intensity, as if various lights were being turned on or off. the "beings" move about the cabin, at least appear to be moving, because something dark moves in front of the lights time and again.
  
the nasa people didn't catch this for at least 10 minutes.  when they became aware, they switched cameras.  on a new view of the space station, you could clearly see the shadow of something big slide over the space station.

i have this recorded on my dish satellite dvr.  i have three other recordings of other objects.  none of them are the same type of object.

if you tell me how to move the recording to another media, i will send it to you for you to evaluate.  heck, i'd even send you the box and let you see the original.

it's the real deal... right there on the nasa channel!  this one is hard to put down to the imagination.  it can't be anything other than an alien ship.
content.summary: Clearly visible image of a ufo on a nasa shuttle mission.  you can detect "people" moving inside craft.  i have a recording off object.

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing on the columbia river down river from the dalles at meemalusa state park. at around 5'o'clock when i noticed a light coming through the trees along the path that went through the trees, the light ball of gas emerged from the bushes glowing blue-green in color. as it got closer directly in my direction the gaseas ball became more of an orb with two defenite but seperate colors. i continued to take pictures becoming more and more excited with every picture i took! it almost seemed to take longer to digitalize on my camera as it came to rest on the ground in front of me. aproximately 15 feet in front of me i continued to take pictures with my 8 pixel digital camera and the ball sat on the ground for about two minutes soon after it rose up and started to travel the back in the direction it came from becomeing a gaseas orb again as it got to the trees i went to try and capture the orb on the other side of the trees as it came across the river. the trip to the point of the cliff overlooking sephulcer island where victor trivett was buried on the indian burial grounds where his deceased chiefs daughter wife was buried would only have been a brief walk. but when i got there, there was no orb or gas ball but i did get some great pictures of the sunset. later i was relooking the photos i took when i realized the pictures i took of the scenery and the orb, the sun was still in the sky, but when i got to the cliff it was a sunset when i was taking pictures of the columbia. later realized that the time that i was missing was twenty minutes. i ended up taking 15 picuters with the orb in them. coming, staying, and leaving.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Floresent green and pink dual color orb

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on manchester avenue in south bend, in, my daughter and i saw an object with large, solid white lights flying extremely low in the neighborhood.  we live in a flight path, and because the object was flying in the opposite direction of the landing path (heading south, then turning west), and was so low, i originally thought a plane was crashing.  then as it came closer to us, we could see that it wasn't a plane and we couldn't figure out what it could be.  we're thinking it was triangular in shape. it had a small light in the center, and at least 3 large solid white lights on the tips.  we are estimating the shape, because all we could see were the lights.  it turned very slowly, westward, and increased its speed and disappeared quickly.  we tried to follow it, but lost sight of it immediately.  there was no sound, which was unusual due to its close proximity to us.  it looked like it could brush the tops of the tall trees on the street.  the whole experience lasted no more than 30 seconds.

i really wanted to follow it to see what it really was.  my curiosity dominated my emotions at that moment.  later, i felt vulnerable.  my daughter felt intimidated - she said it gave her a bad feeling, as if there were malicious intentions.
content.summary: Very bright white lights, flying frighteningly low and slow- i thought a plane was crashing at first.

content.detailedDescription: I was 16 years old when this happened.  it has took me 20 years to accept what i saw and i now feel a need to report it.  it was on the night of dec. 5, 1988 at 12:05 am.  i layed down in my bed that was situated underneath my window.  i had rolled over to go to sleep and a light shown in my room bright enough that i opened my eyes to see what was going on.  i knew there was nobody that could shine a light in my bedroom window because it was very high off the ground.  so, i sat up and looked around and saw out my window a single point of light in the sky.  it looked to be a bright planet but, it started to move at very high rate of speed across the sky in different directions.  it was no airplane because it could turn on a dime and go in the opposite direction with no pause .... it just flew about the sky with ease.  it never got very close and all i saw was the single point of bright light and when it was finished darting across the sky in no apparent pattern it zipped off to the north and was gone.  i could see the single point of light when it zipped around.  it looked like what you would see when you point a flashlight on a wall and zig zag it around. that is what it looked like to me except it was very high in the sky.  my first reaction when i saw the point of light start moving in an unconventional way was to try to scream.  i would open my mouth but nothing could come out.  i tried and tried as i watched this object dart around in the night sky.  i eventually go out a faint squeal.  then my squeals got louder and louder until i could scream very loudly and my mother came to my room in a panic wondering what was going on.  by the time she came in the object had darted off in the sky.  that night i covered my bedroom window and slept the rest of the night with my mom.  after that i moved my bed to the other side of the room and it took me several years to even have my bed facing a window.  now, i still am weary of looking upon the night sky afraid of what i might see.  here i am 20 years later still feeling the need to report what i saw that night.  i still think of it and have no idea if anyone else saw what i did.  i am now on a mission to find out.
content.summary: Single point of bright light.

content.detailedDescription: On or around july 3rd/5th i was on my way home. we left my ofice at 5pm and headed home which was a 45 min. drive. on the way home i saw this huge object in the sky oner head to the west.It was about the size of a wal-mart flying about 45 to 50' over the left side of the road. i pulled up under the edge of the craft and got out of my truck to watch it go over us. my wife and 2 month old son were in the truck, but i could not pass up the chance to see what it was. it was shaped like a big triangle with the tips flatened. from side to side it was 250 to 300feet across , from front to back it was 100 feet and about 2 1/2 to 3 stories tall. as i walked under it the under side looked flat and the edges were rounded. there was a slight breeze as it flew over. as it passed i ran back to the truck to chase it. when i got to my truck it was going the other direction. i turned the truck around and chase it for about 3 miles to the end of the road. it continued on passed  some trees. as it went over the trees two jets ,one on either side escorted it toward dyess air force base, and they dissapeared over the trees. we gohome at 7:15, we should have gotten home around 6:00 pm. my wife called dyess to report it and they said they had nothing in the air at that time. i told her not to tell anyone about this because they would not believe it. after we got home we realized we could not account for at least an hour of our time. i have had trouble sleeping , i have dreams about it. and i can't stop wanting to learn more about it. i have seen shows that talk about missing time and implants and such. i have things under my skin that i don't know where they came from or what they are. they move around and sometimes they bother me and sometime i don't know that they are there. that was not the first one that i have seen . i have seen them since i was a child my brother to . please help me find out what is haunting me.
content.summary: Left work @ 5pm. 45 min. drive , arived home @7:15. on the way home we saw a huge object in the sky. it was moving about 15 mph. it was 50' off the ground and silent. watched it go overhead . it reversed direction, and i turned to chase it. i followed it

content.detailedDescription:
I am a truck driver driving a pickup and delivery route out of fort worth, texas.  at approximately 15:40 on friday april 11, 2008 i had the following experience.  i had just made a freight delivery and was pulling back onto fm 51 headed south/southwest approximately 8 miles south of granbury, texas.  i noticed a light hovering off to my left approximately 35 degrees above the horizon and 30 degrees to my left (slightly east of due south from my location).  my first thought was of the sun reflecting off of a conventional aircraft but as i continued to watch (casually at that point) i realized that the light was not moving and that the source of the light did not seem to be a reflection but rather was a glow emanating from that point.  i then began to observe more closely.  over the next two minutes (approximately) the light diminished in brightness until the well defined outline of an object could be clearly seem.  it was elongated tapering in an arc from a center point to sharp points on either end.  it was approximately 6 to 8 times as long as it was thick at the center point (approximately the shape of a track and field discus as viewed from the side).  i was unable to observe any other dimensions so the exact configuration could not be determined. it could have been a disk shape viewed from the side or an elongated bullet shaped object.  the object then began to recede directly away from me growing smaller but not changing shape or presenting any other view of it that would allow a better description.  i had to look away for a few moments to negotiate a railroad crossing (i was still driving a truck) and when i looked back the object had completely vanished.

by some dead reckoning based on the objects change in position relative to my truck and the distance traveled before the object began to move away i realized that the object had originally been hovering in the general vicinity of the comanche peak nuclear power plant.  i would say within 2 to 3 miles of the facility and probably over the lake which resides on the north side of the plant.  this estimate of the objects position gave me additional reason to believe that it was not a conventional aircraft in that i am reasonably certain that it was well within the no fly zone which it is my understanding exists around all nuclear power facilities.

there was but one other item of interest to report.  that is the fact that approximately 30 minutes after the sighting i realized that i had acquired a significant sunburn on all exposed portions of my body (face, head, neck and arms).  while the sun was shining brightly that day i had not been exposed for any prolonged period; certainly no more so than on any typical day on my job and i rarely get sunburned on my job.  also, i had not felt the sunburn coming on as i normally would.  i simply had a sudden realization that i did in fact have a sunburn.  i really did not at first associate this with the sighting but after both my wife and daughter commented on the unusual degree of sunburn i thought back on it and realized the timing of discovery of the sunburn.  there were no other markings on my body to indicate any other type of contact with the object.  also, there was no lost time as i was on a tight schedule that was not disrupted.  this was not an abduction scenario.

of some note perhaps is the fact that this incident occurred approximately 25 miles due east of the now famous town stephenville, texas.
content.summary: Clear daylight.  sighting began as light hovering 35 degrees above horizon. light deminished until a solid shape emerged.  object was pointed on each end like a discus viewed from the side.

content.detailedDescription:
On a clear early december evening my next door neighbor and i set out on a snowmobile ride around the local airport.  we left approx.  1830, crossing the local fairgrounds out onto the side of the east/west (unplowed) runway.  we traveled west towards the intersection of the north/south runway, and then followed the n/s runway northly to a cutoff that leads to the dam of hansen lake.  we crossed the dam and went up the hillside, ending up on an abandoned section of road (unplowed), and followed it out crossing the griffen ridge road.  here we parked across from the road in a potato field.

we had been there about fifteen minutes talking about school and the lights of the city of presque isle.  the airport was dark, the runway lights at that time were turned on by the houlton flight service station in advance of a departing or arriving aircraft. (note: i grew up at the airport and surrounding navigational stations because my father was the local navaids tech. for the fed aviation agency from 1962 until 1976)and there was only one home across the road next to the "trail" we used to get into the field.

i was looking to my right, towards the south end of presque isle, where us route 1 enters town.  at this time a series of lights in the shape of a cigar appeared out of nowhere, over a point between the university of maine at presque isle and the fairmount cemetary. the lights moved across the sky from the southeast (our right) to the the northwest (our left).  the lights passed over the trees across the road from our field, passing over a mobile home and continued untill reaching the road (trail) that we used to reach our location.  

it was at this time that the lights stopped, appearing to hover, (or maybe rotate) and then move north up the trail disappearing behind the trees.  we waited about thirty minutes, trying to figure another way home.  we decided that passing over that trail was the only way back so we retraced our path home with no events.  arriving home my neighbor's mother said that she was outside looking in that direction at about the same time and saw strange lights moving in the same direction as our lights.

when i got home i asked my father to check with the flight service station and see if any aircraft were in the area at the time.  fss reported that there were no active aircraft in the area, or any request for the runway lights at the presque isle airport to be turned on that night.  there was no moon that night and the sky was clear with unlimited visiblity.  from the vantage point on the side of creasy/griffin ridge, all of presque isle was visible, in fact one would be able to see into canada.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cigar shaped mass of lights swept across sky and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I live near the indianapolis international airport, just north of us 40, east of 465. there is a flight path that is just north of me that flies practically over me. i see planes coming in this way all the time.  i am a heaven gazer and beleive in ufo's. i've seen several over the years but on this particular night, it was right in my face.
 
 it was approximately around august 28, 2006. it was a warm, super quiet night. the skies were absolutely clear and you could see stars forver. i just got home from work and backed into the driveway around 12:40 am. i was then looking east. i was sitting in my truck for a few and just taking in the night sky. what happened next really made me a believer. i seen something very huge, dark and moving slow from the left (north) heading south. i jumped out of my truck and was very excited, with jaw dropped. this thing was extremely quiet. you could not hear any noise what so ever. it was the size of a football field long, disc shaped, and as wide as 2 streets (in a housing district). there were no lights at all. it was lower than the planes coming in, flying over the houses. it was like staying on one precise course and heading due south.  i watched this thing until it got past the rooftops and tree lines on the other side of us 40. i was so excited about seeing this, i stayed outside for awhile and was checking the skies for something more. now you have to understand that there is no flight path that goes from north to south in a straight line where i live. 

my conclusion to this is that it was really indeed an ufo, or the government has a copycat spacecraft out there and spying on all of us.
 

a week later i was telling one of my cousins about what i seen the week before and another cousin of mine, who lives the next street over (east of me) jumped up and freaked out. he said he seen it too and he even told me the time he seen it, which collabarated with my time. he described it the same as i did. he is a night owl and just happened to be outside smoking.
content.summary: Huge, disc shaped with not noise

content.detailedDescription: I work right off of beasely rd and northwest industrial parkway.  i was the last person to leave work on that friday and it was still somewhat light out.  the street lights hadn't came on yet.  i turned east onto beasely rd and as i got close to the entergy power plant. i noticed the object over the treetops. i noticed it because of the lights and because it wasn't moving at all. at first i thought that it might be a light on a radio tower but then i noticed that there was a tower much farther to the right and it had a single red light on it. i pass this way everyday to and from work so i immediately noticed it. it was right past the entergy power plant on beasely road on the right hand side.  as i kept going towards it i kept thinking that it couldn't possibly be what i thought it was.  it scared the hell out of me because i knew that it wasn't a helicoptor or plane because there were no wings or rotors and it was circular. also there was no sound.  i kept looking at it as i was slowly driving.  after about 100 hundred feet or so i pulled over so that i could get out of my car and look at it.  it was right above the treetops the whole time with the lights circling it.  it appeared to be at least a quarter mile in width. as i stopped my car i was still looking at it through my windshield. i opened my car door and stood up and it had disappeared in the 10 seconds or so that it took me to open door and get out.  i looked around in a complete circle and saw nor heard anything. i was so nervous and scared when i got back into the car because i didn't know where it had went to or in what direction.  i was so scared that night that i couldn't sleep. i stayed up all night with the lights on. for the 2 weeks following the incident i barely slept. i would finally go to sleep around 2am and then have to be up at 6am to get ready for work.  i told all of my co-workers and managers about it but they all just laughed at me.  i also told friends and family and no one believed me.
content.summary: Disk shaped with blue and white lights circling it

content.detailedDescription: At 5:30 pm i arrived at the park lawn cementary in the city of commerce california to place flowers on my mother in laws grave,after placing the fowers and cleaning her headstone, i sat next to her grave and beging to p look at the beautiful blue clear sky above,when i noticed that someone had released six blue metallic ballons and how they moved noth east bound with the wind,just followed the waivy motion of the balloons, all of a sudden this bright white metalic object shaped like a rounded bomerang came in to view what made me follow its movements is that it was going the other way against the wind oposite of the ballons  moved and then just stop,i got to see two airplains fly over me directly underneat this thing before i noticed that another sphere or star like object was way way  up above this thing, next thing this object started to go up toward this other one then the other starlike sphere object started to decend and sort of meet thats when my eyes started to  flash and see all kinds of small lights and no longer could i focus so i had to look down refocus my eyes on  the trees in the cementery and then look up againg just to see the first object speed toward the noth west and vanish before my eyes tried to look for the other one but could not find i think they some how merged when i had to look down to refocus all this lasted for aproximately 12 minutes sorry i didt have my camera like last two times on feb-9 and feb-11 when i saw two spheres one golden and the other silver i did take pictures. ,
content.summary: Metalic white  round  edges boomerang

content.detailedDescription: I was in san diego on march 1st to take care of a traffic ticket in court. i was staying at my family's apartment in the center of the city. at approximetly 4:30 i happened to look up in the sky,as i was sitting on the second floor balcony. when i saw huge orange ball, it was west by south like the coranado islands. anyway it was initially very far up in the sky but it was so big it looked close. i remember as it started to decend it was pulsing in the center and the perimeter. like a sound speaker vibrares as sound is comming from it. it also had a cloud like aperature on the top of it in a 12 noon postion. like a mine solar flare. it took a long time for it to decend. but it never stopped pulsing like it was sending a signal or something,eventually it came to a stop. then started parallel movemet to the ground. for about ten minutes. then took off not real fast but faster than in had decended. i do not know how long it was there before i saw it but it lasted for 45 min. to an hour after i saw it.I called for the neighbors to come out but no one would come out and look at it. it was not in the news that night. or on t.V. i do not know how you could miss it. the wierd thing was the pulsing, and the strange cloud of orange vapor cloud or whateever it was. also the shear size of the object.I am sure you could see it for many miles in all directions. yet nothing on radio,tv. scanner nothhing also as it got closer to earth the pulsing was more pronounded but it was totally silent. also i could not tell if it was 3 dimentional or not as it did not turn. just floating. suspended,hanging there for all to see.
content.summary: Large. floating,pulsating,orange disc
